citations.narrative:
The edges of the carpeting used as bedding in three enclosures housing seven total dogs is excessively frayed and worn.
There are long strands of carpet fibers hanging from these worn edges. These fibers can be a danger to dogs if ingested,
or if a toe becomes entangled. The licensee must identify worn carpets in the enclosures and replace them on a regular
basis. Correct by: May 5, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(2) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The edges of the carpeting used as bedding in three enclosures housing seven total dogs is excessively frayed and worn. 
There are long strands of carpet fibers hanging from these worn edges. These fibers can be a danger to dogs if ingested, 
or if a toe becomes entangled. The licensee must identify worn carpets in the enclosures and replace them on a regular 
basis. Correct by: May 5, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
